definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The world multi-polarization trend continues to develop in a zigzagging process.
sentences.chinese: 世界多极化趋势在曲折中发展。

sentences.english: This makes it possible to research the polarization in a ferroelectric substance by HRTEM.
sentences.chinese: 这是利用高分辨成像研究位移型铁电体极化的基础。

sentences.english: Figure 2 Anodic polarization curves of chrome steel samples in simulative mineral slurry.
sentences.chinese: 图2铬钢试样在模拟铜矿浆中的阳极极化曲线。

sentences.english: Both Polarization Dependent and Independent Variable Attenuators are possible.
sentences.chinese: 光纤衰减器有极化独立和非独立两种。

sentences.english: In this paper, renormalization mass of the surface polaron in polar crystals were studied.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了极性半导体中表面极化子重正化质量的性质。

sentences.english: These polarized views could slow down the discussion considerably.
sentences.chinese: 这些极化的观点将拖慢讨论较多。

sentences.english: The performance of the polarizer has reached an advanced level in the world.
sentences.chinese: 圆极化器性能达到国际同类产品的先进水平。

sentences.english: In the moderately polarized anodic region there were two Tafel regions.
sentences.chinese: 在阳极极化中等程度的区域，有两条塔费尔直线。

sentences.english: The physical mechanism and the evolution of quantum wave function in time-domain are studied.
sentences.chinese: 分析了波函数的演化规律和系统极化强度的关系。

sentences.english: It is well established that the cardial contraction is initiated when an action potential depolarizes the sarcolemma.
sentences.chinese: 已经确证，心肌收缩始于动作电位使肌膜去极化。

sentences.english: The temperature deperdence of Polar Crystal Interface Polarons (PCOP) are disscussedy means of Bogolyubov inequality.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用不等式讨论了界面极化子的温度关系。

sentences.english: The polaron effects on excitons in a parabolic quantum well are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了抛物阱中极化子效应对激子的影响。

sentences.english: Early afterdepolarizations are also responsible for the arrhythmias of congestive heart failure.
sentences.chinese: 早期去极化后也可引起充血性心衰的心律失常。

sentences.english: World multi-polarization and economic globalization keep moving deeper.
sentences.chinese: 世界多极化和经济全球化深入发展。

sentences.english: It is also larger for the HH polarization than for VV polarization.
sentences.chinese: 水平极化比垂直极化影响大。

sentences.english: It is also larger for the HH polarization than for VV polarization.
sentences.chinese: 水平极化比垂直极化影响大。

definition: the two poles/the north and south poles/both ends of sth/electric or magnetic poles
